code:
import axios from'axios';const API='/api/auth';// Configure axios to send credentials with all requests
axios.defaults.withCredentials=true;const authService={login:async credentials=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API,"/login"),credentials);return res.data.user;},signup:async data=>{const res=await axios.post("".concat(API,"/signup"),data);return res.data;},getCurrentUser:async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API,"/profile"));return res.data;},logout:async()=>{await axios.post("".concat(API,"/logout"));},getAllUsers:async()=>{const res=await axios.get("".concat(API,"/users"));return res.data.users;},deleteUser:async userId=>{await axios.delete("".concat(API,"/users/").concat(userId));},updateProfile:async data=>{await axios.put("".concat(API,"/profile"),data);}};export default authService;
